nodes.text: The margengai glide was an act that was performed poorly by the fathier Murro, according to preliminary advertisement for Vontor's eve engagements at the Grakkus Arena presented to Grakkus the Hutt by Toren.

The margengai glide was first mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide by Daniel Wallace. In the Star Wars Legends the margengai glide was a type of dance and was written as "margengai-glide." It first appeared in the 1998 novel Rebel Dawn, the third book in the The Han Solo Trilogy by A. C. Crispin.
